cards.abilities: When Shadow Lord enters the field, your opponent discards 1 card. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Relm
cards.abilities: When Relm enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Choose 1 Monster in your opponent's Break Zone. Play it onto your field." "During this turn, if your next Summon of cost 4 or less cast from your hand is put into the Break Zone, remove it from the game instead. Then, cast it again without paying the cost."

cards.name: Warrior of Light
cards.abilities: You can only pay with CP produced by Backups to cast Warrior of Light. Haste First Strike Brave When Warrior of Light enters the field due to your cast, activate all the Backups you control. Draw 1 card. [Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 5000 damage.

cards.name: Vanille
cards.abilities: [EX]When Vanille enters the field, you may search for 1*Card Name Lightning*, *Card Name Fang*, or *Card Name Hope* and add it to your hand. [ability][S]: During this turn, if a Forward opponent controls is dealt damage, double the damage instead. Deal 2000 damage to all the Forwards opponent controls.

cards.name: Bahamut
cards.abilities: If you control 3 or more*Category XIII*Characters, the cost required to cast Bahamut is reduced by 3. Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 10000 damage. If it is put from the field into the Break Zone this turn, remove it from the game instead.

cards.name: Fang
cards.abilities: Haste When Fang attacks, during this turn, the cost required to cast your next *Card Name Bahamut* is reduced by 2. When you cast a Fire Summon, activate Fang. Fang gains "If Fang deals damage to your opponent, the damage becomes 2 instead." until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Snow
cards.abilities: If you control a *Card Name Lightning*, Snow and the *Card Name Lightning* you control gain "This Character cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons." When Snow enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Your opponent discards 1 card." "Choose up to 3 Characters. If you control a*Card Name Serah*, dull them and Freeze them."

cards.name: Serah
cards.abilities: [EX] When Serah enters the field, you may search for 1 *Card Name Mog (XIII-2)* of cost 1 and add it to your hand. When a *Job Moogle* enters your field, choose up to 2 Characters. Dull them or activate them. This effect will trigger only once per turn. [ability] [S][Dull]: Choose 1 Forward. Deal it 8000 damage.

cards.name: Mog (XIII-2)
cards.abilities: The*Card Name Serah* you control cannot be chosen by your opponent's Summons or abilities. [0]: Choose 1*Category XIII* Forward. It gains +2000 power until the end of the turn. You can only use this ability once per turn.

cards.name: Cid Raines
cards.abilities: When Cid Raines enters the field, choose 1 Forward of cost 4 or less opponent controls. Break it. *Damage 3 --* Cid Raines gains +1000 power and First Strike. *Damage 5 --* When Cid Raines attacks, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Break it.

cards.name: Noel
cards.abilities: Haste When Noel attacks, until the end of the turn, Noel gains +1000 power for each *Category XIII* Character you control. When a Forward opponent controls leaves the field, choose 1 Forward opponent controls. Dull it.

cards.name: Hope
cards.abilities: If you control 5 or more *Category XIII*Characters, Hope gains +1000 power. When Hope enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Search for 1 *Category XIII* Forward and add it to your hand." "Choose 1 active Forward. Until the end of the turn, it loses 1000 power for each *Category XIII* Character you control."

cards.name: Lightning
cards.abilities: Haste When 1 or more *Category XIII* Forwards you control attack, all the Forwards you control gain +1000 power until the end of the turn. If 2 or more *Category XIII*Forwards were attacking this turn, also draw 1 card. If 3 or more*Category XIII*Forwards were attacking this turn, Lightning also deals your opponent 1 point of damage.
